EmailTemplate.subject: Shop Hundreds of New Markdowns on A320 and 737 Parts – Now Up to 50% Off!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Based on your previous order history, we think you’re going to love this sale.
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) has dropped the price on hundreds of A320 and 737 parts—and the parts are clearing out fast. Visit HAT’s sleek, modern electronic storefront on GoDirect™ Trade – where you can search for parts and have full access to price, product images and quality documents.
Happy Shopping,
GO TO GODIRECT TRADE <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_a320_a737]]>
Lisa Butters General Manager, GoDirect Trade Honeywell Aerospace +1 (480) 235-2182
